answers.answer: Hi,What other symptoms are present?  Restless Leg Syndrome is usually managed with care directed toward relieving symptoms.  While the cause is unknown in most cases, the symptoms can also be controlled by finding and treating associated medical conditions, such as peripheral neuropathy or diabetes. Alcohol and sleep deprivation also may aggravate or trigger symptoms in some individuals  and it is important to avoid these. If it persists, it is best that you check with your doctor for proper management. Take care and do keep us posted.
